mapper.select: select t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId,t.NAME,t.CompanyType, t.CODE,t.REMARK,t.REPRESENTATIVE ,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE,0) AccountBalance,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_ID,0) AccountId from HR_COMPANY t LEFT JOIN HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.COMPANY_ID=t.COMPANY_ID where t.NAME like '%${value}%' ${where}

select t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId,t.NAME,t.CompanyType, t.CODE,t.REMARK,t.REPRESENTATIVE ,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE,0) AccountBalance,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_ID,0) AccountId from HR_COMPANY t LEFT JOIN HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.COMPANY_ID=t.COMPANY_ID where t.State=0

select t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId,t.NAME,t.CompanyType, t.CODE,t.REMARK,t.REPRESENTATIVE ,isnull(t.State,0) State, isnull(a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE,0) AccountBalance,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_ID,0) AccountId from HR_COMPANY t LEFT JOIN HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.COMPANY_ID=t.COMPANY_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=#{value}

SELECT t.POSITION_ID PositionId,POSITION_NAME PositionName, s.USE_TYPE UseType,s.REMARK ,s.PLAN_COUNT PlanCount,ISNULL(v.RealCount , 0) RealCount,ISNULL(v.LeaveCount , 0) LeaveCount FROM [HR_POSITION] t inner JOIN HR_CO_SETTING s on s.POSITION_ID=t.POSITION_ID left join ( select e.POSITION_ID,sum( case e.State when 1 then 0 else 1 END) RealCount,sum( case e.State when 1 then 1 else 0 END) LeaveCount from HR_EMPLOYEE e where e.COMPANY_ID=#{value} group by e.POSITION_ID ) v on v.POSITION_ID=s.POSITION_ID where s.COMPANY_ID=#{value} order by t.POSITION_ID
mapper.delete: delete from [HR_CO_ACCOUNT_RECORD] where IMPORT_NAME=#{value} and status=0
delete from [HR_CO_SETTING] where COMPANY_ID=#{CompanyId} and POSITION_ID=#{PositionId} and USE_TYPE=#{UseType}
mapper.update: update HR_CO_ACCOUNT set ACCOUNT_BALANCE=#{Money} where COMPANY_ID=(select COMPANY_ID from HR_COMPANY where name=#{CompanyName})
mapper.select: with v as ( select t.IMPORT_NAME importName,max(t.CREATE_TIME) createTime,max(t.PAY_DATE) payDate,sum( t.MONEY) total,max(t.status) status from hr_co_account_record t where t.IMPORT_NAME like '%${value}%' group by t.IMPORT_NAME ) select * from v order by v.payDate,v.importName desc

with v as ( select t.IMPORT_NAME 文件名称,max(t.CREATE_TIME) 文件日期,max(t.PAY_DATE) 结算月份,sum( t.MONEY) 合计,case max(t.status) when 1 then '已结算' else '未结算' end 状态 from hr_co_account_record t where t.IMPORT_NAME like '%${value}%' group by t.IMPORT_NAME ) select * from v order by v.结算月份 desc,v.文件名称

select c.NAME cmpName,t.PAY_DATE payDate,t.MONEY,t.ITEM_NAME itemName,t.BILL_DATE billDate,t.ENTRY_DATE entryDate,t.PERSON_NAME personName,t.OPT_DATE optDate,t.remark from hr_co_account_record t inner join HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.ACCOUNT_ID=t.ACCOUNT_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=a.COMPANY_ID where t.IMPORT_NAME='${value}'

select t.PAY_DATE payDate,t.MONEY,t.ITEM_NAME itemName,t.BILL_DATE billDate,t.ENTRY_DATE entryDate,t.PERSON_NAME personName,t.OPT_DATE optDate,t.remark ,t.CREATE_TIME createTime, a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE AccountBalance,t.id,t.STATUS,a.Company_Id CompanyId from HR_CO_ACCOUNT_RECORD t inner join HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.ACCOUNT_ID=t.ACCOUNT_ID where t.IMPORT_NAME='${value}' and t.STATUS=0 order by t.ACCOUNT_ID, t.id

with v as ( select t.ACCOUNT_ID ,t.PAY_DATE,sum( t.MONEY) total from hr_co_account_record t where t.PAY_DATE is not null and t.status=1 and t.PAY_DATE>=#{start} and t.PAY_DATE<#{end} group by t.ACCOUNT_ID,t.PAY_DATE ) select c.NAME cmpName,v.PAY_DATE payDate,v.total from v inner join HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.ACCOUNT_ID=v.ACCOUNT_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=a.COMPANY_ID order by v.PAY_DATE desc,c.NAME

with v as ( select t.ACCOUNT_ID ,t.PAY_DATE,sum( t.MONEY) total from hr_co_account_record t where t.PAY_DATE is not null and t.status=1 and t.PAY_DATE>=#{start} and t.PAY_DATE<#{end} group by t.ACCOUNT_ID,t.PAY_DATE ) select c.NAME 单位名称,v.PAY_DATE 结算日期,v.total 结算金额 from v inner join HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.ACCOUNT_ID=v.ACCOUNT_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=a.COMPANY_ID order by v.PAY_DATE desc,c.NAME
